import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function App(){// Create individual refs at the top level of the component

);// State to track the currently active section

Object.values(sections).forEach(ref=>{if(ref.current){observer.observe(ref.current);}});// Cleanup the observer when the component unmounts
